name: ORDER_CASE_PANEL_INFO
description: This table stores data about panels for case request orders.

columns.name: ORDER_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: REQUESTED_PROC_MINUTES
columns.description: This item contains the surgeon's requested total procedure length in minutes for a panel in a case request order.

columns.name: PROC_LENGTH_MODIFIED_YN
columns.description: This item stores whether the requested panel length is a user-modified value.

columns.name: REQUESTED_PROC_COMMENTS
columns.description: This item contains the surgeon's comments about a requested total procedure length for a panel in a case request order.

columns.name: PANEL_CONFIDENCE_C_NAME
columns.description: Confidence score for the estimated time for a panel generated by Epic

columns.name: PAN_DURATION_ESTIMATE_MINUTES
columns.description: Estimated panel duration generated by Epic

columns.name: PANEL_REQ_LEN_USER_ID
columns.description: This item tracks the last user to modify the requested total procedure length in minutes for a panel in a case request order so that the default length is not used.

columns.name: PANEL_REQ_LEN_USER_ID_NAME
columns.description: The name of the user record. This name may be hidden.
